260: MEGA is a recursive acronym and stands for "MEGA Encrypted Global Access".
262: MEGA is a secure cloud storage and electronic collaboration/communication service. It offers free and paid Internet-accessible storage space and bandwidth. It allows you to store and access your files from within your web browser or through dedicated client applications.
264: To the best of our knowledge, cloud storage and encryption are legal. Please comply with applicable laws and regulations on [B]how[/B] you use cloud storage and encryption as well as our [A]Terms of Service[/A].
265: MEGA was made by the same people that had previously run one of the world's largest cloud storage businesses. Can I please have my account and my files back?
266: Unfortunately, MEGA has no access to any of the assets that its employees have created previously. There is no legal connection and no recycling of any code, hardware or database records, and we therefore currently see no way of recovering your legacy data.
267: Why base a cloud storage company in New Zealand, of all places?
268: Among other important reasons, New Zealand's native Māori name is "Aotearoa", which means "Land of the long white cloud".
269: Can I access MEGA on my mobile device?
270: You can access MEGA through your mobile browser, but this severely limits performance and functionality. We recommend using our dedicated mobile app for your device instead.
271: Can I resume interrupted up- or downloads?
272: Yes, as long as you do not close the browser tab, uploads and downloads will resume automatically after e.g. a network interruption or your device having entered standby/sleep mode. Please note that our servers automatically discard incomplete uploads after 48 hours of inactivity.
273: Can I upload the same file multiple times?
274: Because the server can't see filenames, filename collisions have to be dealt with on the client side. With standard settings, if you upload a file that you already seem to have in your account (same target path/filename, same size, same last modification time), it is skipped, but nothing prevents you from keeping multiple files or folders with the same name in the same folder.
275: How do you regulate bandwidth utilization?
276: Our policy is not to impose any artificial restrictions on our users unless necessitated by infrastructure bottlenecks.  We therefore reserve the right to cap user bandwidth utilization for operational reasons at any time on a per-IP basis. Your transfer queue will resume automatically once the congestion eases. No manual intervention is required.
277: Are there any file size limits on MEGA?
278: We do not impose artificial file size limits other than your available cloud drive space. While all current browsers are capable of uploading large files, downloading is size-constrained with Internet Explorer and Safari due to their incomplete HTML5 support.
279: Can I upload and download at the same time?
280: Yes. One upload and one download per browser tab can run in parallel.
281: Why don't you provide image thumbnails or streamed previewing of video and audio files?
282: Because our end-to-end encryption model inherently precludes any server-side manipulation of your data, which would be required to implement such a feature.
283: How do I upload files to MEGA?
284: There are three ways of uploading files to MEGA using your web browser:
285: 1. Click on the red button on the start page
286: 2.	Go to your file manager and click on the "File Upload" or (if you're using Chrome) "Folder 	Upload" buttons near the top
287: 3. Drag and drop files or (if you're using Chrome) folders onto the site
289: MEGA can be used with any modern web browser. However, depending on your specific browser's capabilities, some features may be unavailable - we strongly recommend using Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox or Opera Next. Advanced functionality such as automated folder synchronization or filesystem mounts will be made available through installable client applications.
291: You can share any subtree of your cloud drive with friends, family or coworkers. Invitation is by e-mail address. Invitees who do not have an account yet will receive an e-mail notification with a signup link. Alternatively, you can create a public link to any of your folders and export the folder-specific crypto key, making it accessible without a MEGA account. It is then your responsibility to securely transmit the folder key to the recipient(s).
292: To establish, modify or delete a share, simply right click on a folder in your file manager and select Sharing. There are three access levels: Read-only, read/write (files can be added, but not deleted), and full (files can be added and deleted).
293: If you added an e-mail address that did not have an account yet, you need to be online at least once after the recipient completes the signup process so that you can encrypt the share secret to his newly created public key.
294: How do I delete people from my shared folder?
295: Simply right click on a folder in your file manager and select sharing. You will see all people that currently have access to the shared folder. Right click on the person and choose the Delete option from the menu.
296: How do I recognize my shared folders?
297: Shared folders in your file manager have a special icon with a hand below the folder.
298: Can I share folders that were shared with me?
302: How do I link to a file on MEGA?
303: First of all, a word of caution: The cryptographic security of your files depends on the confidentiality of the associated encryption keys. Make sure that you transmit them via protected channels only! Standard e-mail, for example, is not good enough.
304: With that in mind, select one or multiple files in your file manager, then right-click and use "Get link". A dialog with the public link(s) to the file(s) you have selected will open. You can choose to export each link and key separately or as a single combo link.
306: All encryption is end-to-end. Data uploaded is encrypted on the uploading device before it is sent out to the Internet, and data downloaded is decrypted only after it has arrived on the downloading device.  The client machines are responsible for generating, exchanging and managing the encryption keys. No usable encryption keys ever leave the client computers (with the exception of RSA public keys).
307: Is all of my personal information subject to encryption?
308: No. Only file data and file/folder names are encrypted. Information that we need operational access to, such as your e-mail address, IP address, folder structure, file ownership and payment credentials, are stored and processed unencrypted. Please see our privacy policy for details.
309: Is my stored data absolutely secure?
310: All security is relative. The following attack vectors exist - they are not specific to MEGA, but we want you to know about the risks:
312: - Spyware on your computer. A simple keylogger is enough, but session credentials and keys could also be extracted from memory or the filesystem.
313: - Shoulder surfing. Do not type your password while someone could watch your keystrokes.
315: - Phishing. Always confirm the security status of your connection (https://) and the correct domain name (mega.co.nz) before entering your password.
316: Large-scale attacks could be mounted through:
317: - A "man in the middle" attack. Requires issuing a valid duplicate SSL certificate in combination with DNS forging and/or attacks on our BGP routes (a DigiNotar-style scenario).
318: - Gaining access to the webservers hosting https://mega.co.nz/index.html and replacing that file with a forged version (this would not affect access through the installed app base). Note that manipulating content on our distributed static content CDN does not pose a security risk, as all active content loaded from index.html is subject to verification with a cryptographic hash (think of it as some kind of "secure boot" for websites). This type of attack requires sending malicious code to the client and is therefore detectable.
319: - Gaining access to our core server infrastructure and creating forged key requests on existing shares. This type of attack only affects data in accounts with shared folders and is detectable on the client side as well.
320: What if I don't trust you? Is it still safe for me to use MEGA?
321: If you don't trust us, you cannot run any code provided by us, which precludes opening MEGA in your browser and entering your login credentials. However, due to MEGA's end-to-end encryption paradigm, you can safely use client applications written by someone you trust.
322: I trust you and your New Zealand data centre, but I don't trust your German data centre, because it is run by a US company.  Is it still safe for me to use MEGA?
323: Yes, you can still use MEGA (with a few limitations) safely with our core datacentre in Germany being fully compromised. The New Zealand data centre makes sure that no rogue code can run when you visit https://mega.co.nz/.
324: Is data that I put in shared folders as secure my other data?
325: Shared folders, by nature, are only as secure as their least secure member. However, a compromise of our core server infrastructure poses an additional risk: Public keys could be manipulated, and key requests could be forged.
326: Let's assume that a MEGA storage node is physically compromised. What are the risks?
327: Error messages after downloading manipulated files. Even if the attacker had the encryption key for a given file on that node, he could still not replace it with a forged one without causing the subsequent downloads to fail.
328: Is it a good idea to store all of my data in a single place?
329: Always keep redundant copies of important files, online and offline. Although we keep each file in at least two locations, there is no guarantee against multiple concurrent failures and repeated unprecedented government misconduct.
330: Why should I entrust my data to, of all people, you?
331: We provide for user controlled encryption (UCE) where you, the user, control the keys. The UCE implementation is open source, and we invite and encourage the community to scrutinize it and provide feedback. We believe that this approach is much safer than storing your data on a provider with server-side encryption where the ISP controls the keys or, worse, no encryption at all. For example, if MEGA user files were suddenly accessible without a password due to a programming error, they would be unreadable without the user-controlled decryption keys.
332: I noticed that you are using HTTPS for transferring already encrypted file data. Isn't that redundant?
333: It is. Unfortunately, most browsers take offence with establishing insecure connections from a secure page, and who could blame them for that - they can't possibly be aware of the fact that there is another encryption layer already in operation. Because HTTPS has an adverse effect on performance, we allow you to turn it off on browsers that allow it (Chrome, Safari and Firefox until version 17) to speed up your transfers without jeopardizing the confidentiality or integrity of your data. You will see an SSL warning appear upon your first file transfer in some browsers - in this (and only in this) case, it is safe to ignore.
334: What encryption algorithms does MEGA use internally?
335: For bulk transfers, AES-128 (we believe that the higher CPU utilization of AES-192 and AES-256 outweighs the theoretical security benefit, at least until the advent of quantum computers). Post-download integrity checking is done through a chunked variation of CCM, which is less efficient than OCB, but not encumbered by patents.
336: For establishing shared secrets between users and dropping files into your inbox, RSA-2048 (the key length was chosen as middle grounds between "too insecure" and "too slow"). All encryption, decryption and key generation is implemented in JavaScript, which limits throughput to a few MB/s and causes significant CPU load. We are looking forward to the implementation of the proposed HTML5 WebCrypto API in all major browsers, which will eliminate this bottleneck.
337: JavaScript's built-in random number generator is enhanced through a mouse/keyboard timing-driven RC4 entropy pool as well as crypto.* randomness where available (Chrome and Firefox only at the moment - keys generated by Internet Explorer and Safari are less secure than they could be).
338: Does MEGA keep backups of my files?
339: We store your files on at least two servers in different datacentres, if available.
340: I have forgotten my password. Can I reset it?
344: When do I need to upgrade to a Pro account?
345: A Pro account gives you additional storage space and extra bandwidth quota that we automatically draw from whenever an operational bandwidth limit is reached - you can use the quota yourself, or grant it to third parties accessing your data (this includes users without a MEGA account).  The maximum percentage of your bandwidth quota allocated to third parties is configurable in your account settings.
346: What is the upload speed limiting feature good for?
347: Many routers do not prioritize smaller packets in case of link congestion, resulting in your inbound traffic being severely affected when your outbound link is full. We therefore offer an automatic speed management option where we measure your available outbound bandwidth during the initial ten seconds of an upload and then keep at least 10% of it unused. You can also set a fixed throughput limit.
348: What do I get with my free account?
349: A globally accessible, high-performance, secure cloud drive with [X] of storage space. If you need more than that, you can upgrade to a [A1]Pro[/A1] account. Click [A2]here[/A2] to see your current utilization.

622: MEGA respekteer ander se kopiereg en verwag van gebruikers van cloud dienste om dieselfde te doen. Ons sal reageer op kennisgewings van beweerde oortredings van kopieregte wat voldoen aan die toepaslike wetgewing en wat behoorlik aan ons voorsien is. As jy glo jou inhoud is gekopiëer of gebruik op 'n manier wat kopiereg oortredings beteken, voorsien ons asb met die volgende inligting: (i) 'n fisiese of elektroniese handtekening van die eienaar van die kopiereg, of 'n persoon wat gemagtg is om namens hul op te tree; (ii) identifikasie van die werk onder kopiereg wat na beweering oortree is; (iii) identifikasie van die materiaal wat na beweering oortree, of wat die onderwerp van oortredende optrede is, of wat verwyder moet word of waarna toegang afgeskakel moet word, en inligting wat redelik genoegsaam is om ons in staat te stel om die materiaal op te spoor, insluitend bv die URL; (iv) jou kontak inligting, insluitend jou adres, telefoonnommer, en e-posadres; (v) 'n verklaring deur jou dat jy in goederdtrou glo dat die gebruik van die materiaal op die wyse vaarvan gekla word, nie deur die eienaar van die kopiereg, sy agent, of die wet goedgekeur is nie, en (vi) 'n verklaring dat die inligting in die kennisgewing akuraat is, en, dat jy onderhewig aan die straf van meineed, gemagtig is om namens die eienaar van die kopiereg op te tree.
623: Ons behou die reg voor om inligting wat na beweering oortree, sonder kennisgewing te verwyder, volgens ons eie diskressie, en sonder aanspreeklikheid aan jou. In toepaslike omstandighede sal MEGA ook  jou rekening beëindig as jy vasbeslote is om 'n herhaling oortreder te wees . Ons aangewysde kopiereg agent vir kennisgewing van kopiereg oortreding wat voorkom op die Cloud Dienste is:
625: Gebruik asb hierdie vorm om 'n kopiereg kennisgewing in te dien. Ons sal binne 24 uur reageer (onmiddelik gedurende besigheids ure).
629: Oortredinge van die kopiereg van iemand wat ek gemagtig is om te verteenwoordig.
632: 1. Skakel slegs die openbare URLs af wat voorsien is - die lêer(s) sal in die eienaar se rekening(e) bly
633: Skakel alle openbare URLs van die onderleggende lêer(s) af vir die URLs wat voorsien is - die lêer(s) sal in die eienaar se rekening bly

Anders as meeste van ons kompeteerders, gebruik ons topklas, browser gebasseerde enkripsie tegnologie waar jy, nie ons nie, die sleutels beheer. 1820: Binnekort hier vir Mac en Linux
1821: Toe ons MEGA vroeg in 2013 van stapel gestuur het, was globale massa afluistering onder die voorwendsel van terrorisme bevegting steeds 'n wilde veronderstelling en die wat dit voorgestel het is gereeld uitgekryt as sameswering teoretici. Edward Snowdense openbarings 137 dae later het publieke houding fundamenteel verander en dit het pynlik duidelik geword dat sekuriteit deur beleid ("ons het toegang tot jou data, maar ons belowe om dit konfidensieel te hou en nie te misbruik nie") nie goed genoeg was nie. Enige iets minder as sekuriteit deur ontwerp/ ("ons kan nie toegang tot jou data bekom sonder dat jy dit agterkom nie"), waarvoor sterk eindpunt-tot-eindpunt enkripsie 'n noodsaaklike voorvereiste is, blyk nou vêr tekort te skiet.
1822: MEGA is ontwerp rondom die eenvoudige feit dat kriptografie, vir dit om aanvaar en gebruik te word, moet dit nie inmeng met bruikbaarheid nie. MEGA is ten volle toegangbaar sonder voorafgaande sagteware installasie en dit bly die enigste cloud bergings verskaffer met browser-gebaseerde hoë-werksverrigting eindpunt-tot-eindpunt enkripsie. Die enigste sigbare tekens van die kripto laag wat onder MEGA se vaandel werk is die entropie versameling gedurende aantekening, die hebrek aan 'n wagwoord herstel funksie en die novelle (en browser-spesifieke) manier waarop lêer oorplasings gedoen word. Vandag maak miljoene besigheids en persoonlike gebruikers staat op MEGA om veilig en betroubaar petabytes te berg en bedien en ons glo dat hierdie sukses die gevolg is van MEGA se lae versperring na 'n meer veilige cloud.
1823: Ons huur gedurig. As jy 'n uitstaande sagteware ingeneur is en jy wil by ons globale span aansluit, moet asb nie huiwer om jou CV aan te stuur na jobs@mega.co.nz nie.
1824: Jy is tans ingeteken. Wil jy uit teken en 'n nuwe rekening registreer?
1826: MEGAsync is 'n installeerbare program wat gidse tussen jou rekenaar en jou MEGA cloud skyf sinkroniseer. Alle lêers en sub-gidse sal herhaal word na beide kante. Veranderings wat jy maak aan die een kant sal byne terselfdertyd aan die anderkant verskyn (binne perke van die skakel/sisteem se vertraging en die lêer oorplasing tye).
1828: Gaan na die [A] aflaai bladsy [/A] en volg die instruksies. Gedurende die installasie, sal jy gevra word om in te skryf of skep jou MEGA rekening en vir die opstel van die gidse om te herhaal (óf jou volle MEGA cloud skyf na 'n enkele plaaslike gids of spesifieke sub-gids in jou cloud skyf na die ooreenstemmende plaaslike gidse). Na die installasie voltooi is, sal MEGAsync outomaties begin. Onder Windows, sal jy 'n klikbare MEGA logo sien in die system tray terwyl die sync tool loop wat jou toegang gee tot 'n status pop en die verstellings bladsy.
1829: Kan ek MEGAsync op veelvuldige rekenaars gebruik?
1830: Ja. Deur veelvuldige toestelle met dieselfde cloud skyf te sinkroniseer, kan jy oorkruis-rekenaar sinkronisering vermag.
1831: Hoe kan ek die sinkronisering status van my plaaslike gidse en lêers monitor?
1832: Ikone van lêers en gidse wat besig is om te syinkroniseer met die cloud sal gemerk word met 'n groen sirkel. Oorplasings in proses word aangedui deur 'n blou sirkel; oorplasings wat nog wag wys in rooi.
1833: MEGAsync berg my insluitings kredensies om outo-insluiting te vermag. Is dit nie 'n sekuriteits bekommernis nie?
1834: Nie as jy jou plaaslike skyf geënkripteer hou nie (doen dit asb. Hoekom sou jy van 'n geënkripteerde cloud skyf sinkroniseer na 'n nie-geënkripteerde plaaslike skyf?).
1835: Ek het 'n lêer van 'n plaaslike gesinkroniseerde gids uitgevee terwyl MEGAsync nie geloop het nie. Toe begin ek dit, en die lêer het weer verskyn. Hoekom?
1836: Die huidige inkarnasie van MEGAsync onthou nie jou plaaslike lêersisteem status oor herbeginnings nie. Dit het geen manier om te weet dat 'n plaaslike lêer weggeraak het sedert die laaste keer dat dit geloop het nie. Daarom, hou MEGAsync altyd aan die hardloop as jy jou plaaslike uitwissings ordentlik wil herhaal.
1837: 'n Belangrike lêer was oorgeskryf deur die sync klient. Wat kan ek doen om dit terug te kry?
1838: Op die cloud kant, sal verwyderde lêers geskuif word na 'n spesiale "SyncDebris" subgids struktuur in jou vullisdrom en kan opgespoor word van daar af (gebruik MEGA se ingeboude soek indien nodig). Op die plaaslike rekenaar sal elke sync se wortel gids'n verborge "puin" gids hê waarin geskrapte items geplaas word.
1840: Nee. Maar jy kan toegang kry tot oorgeskryfde lêers in die puin gids totdat dit weggevee word.
1841: Ondersteun MEGAsync die verandering van bestaande lêers?
1842: No As 'n gesinkroniseerde lêer verander, is dit altyd vervang as 'n geheel. Daarom is dit nie aanbeveel om bv groot log lêers of databasis tabelle te sinkroniseer nie. Geïnkripteerde delta skryf word beplan vir 'n toekomstige vrystelling.
1845: Is daar enige beperkins rakende lêername?
1846: MacOS/UNIX lêername is kassensitief, Windows lêername is nie. 'n Gids wat beide "ABC.TXT" en "abc.txt" bevat kan gesinkroniseer word na 'n UNIX masjien sonder probleme, maar wanneer na 'n Windows masjien gesinkroniseer word sal slegs een van die twee lêers oorleef.
1847: MEGA stel geen beperking op lêername - hulle kan karakters bevat wat in stryd is met die bedryfstelsel, soos: of *. Dit sal herskryf word as% xx op die plaaslike kant en terug omskep word na die oorspronklike karakter wanneer gesinkroniseer word. Die Windows Explorer het ook probleme met 'n aantal skynbaar onskadelike lêer en gids name - "con.doc", byvoorbeeld, sou nie toeganklik wees (om te verstaan ​​waarom moet jy 'n geek of 'n veteraan, of beide wees). As jy so 'n situasie teëkom, hernoem eenvoudig die lêer op die cloud kant. vreemde karakters in lêername word ten volle ondersteun.
1848: MEGAsync ondersteun redelike diep gids strukture (MEGA self is beperk tot 'n maksimum van 63 vlakke) en baie lang padname (tot 32000 karakters onder Windows). Ongelukkig is die meeste Windows sagteware (insluitend die Explorer) nie in staat om toegang te verkry tot lêers wie se pad  langer is as 260 karakters nie.
1849: Hoe kan ek seker maak dat ek altyd die nuutste weergawe van MEGAsync het?
1850: MEGAsync soek vir 'n nuwe weergawe elke twee ure en updateer self as een beskikbaar is (jy kan dit afskakel in die instellings - die volgende soek word uitgevoer wanneer jy dit weer aanskakel). Vir veiligheidsredes, word slegs die rekening wat aanvanklik geïnstalleer is in MEGAsync toegelaat om dit by te werk.
1851: Sal MEGAsync peer-to-peer oorplasings gebruik om vinniger sinkronisering te verkry tussen rekenaars op dieselfde plaaslike netwerk?
1852: Nee. Die hiudige weergawe van MEGAsync sinkroniseer altyd via MEGA se cloud infrastruktuur.
1853: Wat gebeur as gelyktydige aksies uitgevoer word op kliente wat na dieselfde cloud ligging sinkroniseer?
1854: Die huidige weergawe van MEGAsync sorteer nie sulke botsings in 'n deterministiese manier uit nie. Vermy hulle indien moontlik.
1855: Ondersteun MEGAsync gevorderde lêerstelsel funksies soos skakels, eienskappe, ACL, strome / vurke of yl lêers?
1856: Nee. moet nie werwag dat hulle na die cloud herhaal sal word nie.
1857: Ondersteun MEGAsync sinkronisering van dieselfde plaaslike gids na verskillende afgeleë plekke of dieselfde afstand gids na verskillende plaaslike plekke?
1858: Nee, tensy jy veelvuldige MEGAsync prosesse wil  uitvoer in parallel, wat nie aanbeveel word nie. As 'n algemene reël, moet elke lêerstelsel item net eenkeer sigbaar wees na MEGAsync , so vermy sinkronisering van  subgidse van gesinkroniseerde gidse of die plasing van verskeie skakels na dieselfde lêerstelsel item in 'n plaaslike gesinkroniseerde gids.

1939: Sleutel asb jou epos adres hieronder in. Jy sal 'n herstel skakel ontvang wat jou sal in staat stel om jou meester sleutel in te sleutel en jou wagwoord te herstel.
1942: As gevolg van ons einpunt-tot-eindpunt paradigma, sal jy nie instaat wees om toegang tot jou data te verkry sonder 'n [A]backup[/A] of jou meester sleutel nie.
1943: Jy kan jou bestaande rekening parkeer en 'n vars een begin onder dieselfde epos adres. Ingeval jy jy jou geparkeerde rekening se wagwoord onthou, kontak asb [A]support@mega.co.nz[/A] vir herstel bystand. Jou data sal vir ten minste 60 dae gehou word.
1944: Jy kan nie rekening herstel gebruik met 'n aktiewe tydelike sessie nie.
1945: Jy is tans ingesluit met die rekening [X]. As jy nie jou huidige wagwoord kan onthou nie en jy wil jou wagwoord verander, voer asb sy meester sleutel uit, sluit dan uit en probeer weer.
1946: Gaan asb die epos adres na en probeer weer.
1948: Jy hat jou wagwoord verloor en kan nie 'n vorige uitgevoerde wagwoord verskaf nie? Ongelukkig, as gevolg van MEGA se sterk kriptografie, stel die verlies van jou meester sleutel al jou data onleesbaar. As jy voortgaan sal jy 'n vars rekening begin onder jou bestaande epos adres. Jou ou rekening salmgeparkeer bly vir ten minste 60 dae en kan herstel word deur [A]support@mega.co.nz[/A] te kontak indien jy jou wagwoord onthou.
1950: Ek bevestig dat ek 'n vars, leë rekening begin en dat ek alle data in my huidige rekening sal verloor tensy ek my wagwoord onthou of afkom op 'n uitgevoerde meester sleutel.
1953: Ons hou 'n backup van jou data vir ten minste nog 60 dae.
1954: Indien jy jou wagwoord onthou, kontak asb support@mega.co.nz vir bystand met die herwinning van jou ou rekening se data.
1956: Verskaf asb jou vorige uitgevoerde meester sleutel. Jy kan dit steeds uitvoer van enige MEGA sessie wat jy mag oophê in 'n ander leser of op 'n ander rekenaar.
1957: Indien jy nie jou meester sleutel het nie, kan jy jou rekening [A]parkeer[/A] en oor begin.

1984: Jou data is slegs leesbaar deur 'n ketting van dekripsie operasies wat begin met jou meester enkripsie sleutel, wat ons geinkriptiseer stoor saam met jou wagwoord. Dit beteken dat as jy jou wagwoord verloor kan jou meester sleutel nie meer gedekriptiseer word nie, en jy kan nie meer jou data dekriptiseer nie.
1985: Deur die meester sleutel uit te voer en dit in 'n veilige ligging te stoor stel jou in staat om 'n nuwe wagwoord op te stel sonder data verlies.
1986: 'n Aanvaller van buite kan nie toegang tot jou rekening kry met slegs jou sleutel nie. Om jou wagwoord te herset verg beide die sleutel en toegang tot jou epos.
1987: Bêre meester sletel as teks lêer
1991: Hou altyd fisiese beheer van jou meester-sleutel (bv op 'n kliënt toestel eksterne storing, of druk).
1992: Moenie dit op die internet stoor nie (ten minste nie sonder enkripsie nie)
1994: Ja. Alhoewel, jou MEGA wagwoord is meer as net 'n wagwoord - dit sluit jou meester enkripsie sleutel oop, wwarsonder jou data geheel onleesbaar is. Dus, daar is twee soorte wagwoord herstellings: Met of sonder om 'n kopie van jou gebergde meester sleutel te verskaf. Met die sleutel kan jy net 'n nuwe wagwoord opstel en jy hou jou bestaande rekening. sonder die sleutel kan jy jou bestaande rekening parker, en 'n nuwe rekening begin onder jou bestaande rekening se epos adres. Ons stel voor dat jy 'n backup van jou sleutel in 'n veilige plek hou te alle tye, net vir ingeval!Druk here om jou sleutel uit te voer, of here om jou wagwoord te herstel
1995: Ek het sopas die wagwoord van my ou rekening onthou nadat ek 'n wagwoord herstel gedoen het. Hoe kry ek my data terug?
1996: As daar minder as 60 dae verloop het sedert jy jou ou rekening geparkeer het, kan jou data herwin word. Kontak asb [A]support@mega.co.nz[/A] vir bystand.
1997: MEGA vra my om 'n backup te maak van my meester sleutel. Hoekom?
1998: As jy definitief seker is jy sal nooit jou wagwoord verloor nie, is daar geen rede om jou sleutel te backup nie. As jy wel besluit om 'n [A]backup[/A] te maak, hou dit egter in 'n veilige plek: Enige iemand met toegang tot jou backup sleutel en jou epos kan jou wagwoord herstel en toegang verkry tot jou data.
1999: Kan ek FAT/FAT32 partisies onder Windows sinkroniseer?
2000: Hoewel dit mag lyk om te werk met die eerste oogopslag, raai ons daarteen aan, want FAT tyd stempel is tydsone afhanklik , wat daartoe lei dat al jou lêers weer gesynchroniseer word  twee keer 'n jaar as jy woon in 'n dagligbesparingstyd gebied. Ongelukkig, die volgende fundamentele ontwerp fout in die Windows API ontwerp maak dit moeilik om dinamies  te vergoed vir sulke veranderinge: "Wanneer dit dagligbesparingstyd is,  word die tyd opgespoor deur GetFileTime 'n uur af, want die cache is nie opgedateer wanneer jy begin het nie.  Wanneer jy die rekenaar oorbegin sorg die cache dat GetFileTime  korrek is. "Met ander woorde, doen jouself 'n guns en vermy FAT.
2001: Wil jy jou leers upload na 'n nuwe sessie?
2002: "Nee" sal jou in staat stel om aan te meld en jou upload te begin.
2003: Backup jou meester enkripsie sleutel nou
2004: Anders as met legacy cloud storings dienste is MEGA eindpunt-tot-eindpunt enkripsie. Dit beteken dat jou data onleesbaar raak as jy jou wagwoord verloor. Ons wil ernstig voorstel dat jy jou meester enkripsie sleutel nou backup. Wagwoord herstellings sonder data verlies is slegs moontlik indien jy 'n geldige meester sleutel vir jou rekening kan verskaf.

5834: MEGA is a secure cloud storage service with 50 GB free storage space.Inside the app you can upgrade your storage space & bandwidth quota by subscribing to MEGA Pro with a monthly or yearly subscription.Subscriptions are €9.99 (US$10.99) per month or €99.99 (US$119.99) per year.This subscription gives you 500 GB of storage space and 1000 GB of bandwidth per month.Subscriptions are renewed automatically for successive subscription periods of the same duration and at the same price as the initial period chosen. You can switch off the automatic renewal of your MEGA Pro subscription no later than 24 hours before your next subscription payment is due via your iTunes account settings page. To manage your subscriptions, simply click on the App Store icon on your handset, sign in with your Apple ID at the bottom of the page (if you haven't already done so) and then click ViewID. You'll be taken to your account page where you can scroll down to Manage App Subscriptions. From here, you can select yourMEGA Pro subscription and view your scheduled renewal date, choose a different subscription package or toggle the on-off switch tooff to disable the auto-renewal of your subscription.Terms of Service:https://mega.co.nz/ios_terms.htmlPrivacy policy:https://mega.co.nz/ios_privacy.html
5835: With PhotoSync, the photos you take with your iPhone will be automatically backed up to MEGA.You can use WiFi or cellular connection and by enabling Background mode the app will upload photos when your location changes significantly.Passcode lock adds a new layer of security by requiring a four-digit passcode to be entered every time the app is launched. This will protect your files even if your iPhone falls into the wrong hands. There’s also an option to erase all data and logout if the wrong password is entered over 10 times.Various bug fixes and speed improvements.Your feedback is very important to us and, although we might not answer every email, we read each and every one.Also, your 5-stars rating in the AppStore is always appreciated.

5909: MacOS/UNIX filenames are case sensitive, Windows filenames are not. A folder containing both "ABC.TXT" and "abc.txt" can be synced to a UNIX machine without problems, but when synced to a Windows machine, only one of the two files will survive.MEGA imposes no restrictions on filenames - they can contain characters that are incompatible with the operating system, such as : or *. These will be rewritten as %xx on the local side and converted back to the original character when synced back. The Windows Explorer also has trouble with a number of seemingly innocuous file and folder names - "con.doc", for example, would not be accessible (to understand why, you have to be a geek or a veteran, or both). If you encounter such a situation, simply rename the file on the cloud side. Foreign characters in filenames are fully supported.MEGAsync supports fairly deep folder structures (MEGA itself is limited to a maximum of 63 levels) and very long pathnames (up to 32,000 characters under Windows). Unfortunately, most Windows software (including the Explorer) is unable to access files whose path is longer than 260 characters.
